DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate whether propofol improve quality recovery compare desflurane patient undergoing robotic laparoscopic gastrectomy .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Desflurane Propofol Quality Recovery Patients Undergoing Robotic Laparoscopic Gastrectomy
DOC.criteria: adult patient age 20 yr schedule laparoscopic robotic gastrectomy , ASA 1 2. patient allergy anesthetic agent body mass index 35 kg/m2 pregnancy
